name: Flame of Blood, Blaze My Path

passive.name: Vista
passive.description:
Increases the wearer's Max HP by {{1, percent}}% and Incoming Healing by {{6, percent}}%. When using Skill or Ultimate, consumes HP equal to {{2, percent(fixed: 1)}}% of the wearer's Max HP and increases the DMG dealt by this attack by {{3, percent}}%. If this effect's consumed HP is greater than {{4}}, the DMG additionally increases by {{5, percent}}%.
If the current HP is not sufficient, this effect reduces the wearer's current HP down to 1.
